author: Sarah Saunders
text:
The City of Fort Lauderdale is interested in learning about the benefits and/or savings that other organizations have experienced due to 5S improvement projects. We are in the process of developing a 5S training module for staff to implement this tool citywide and would like to hear about your experiences. Thanks! 
ssaunders@fortlauderdale.gov
Sarah Saunders, MPA
title: Benefits and/or savings from 5S
